tasks.label: Vite dev (single instance)
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; if(Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue){ Get-Process -Name node | Where-Object { $_.MainWindowTitle -like '*vite*' -or $_.Path -like '*node.exe' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; npm run dev
